name: In A Blink: Early Access
description:
CONTROLS::

J - attack/dodge

CTRL - toggle neutral and attack phase

SPACE - interact

W,A,S,D - move

It's life as usual in your peaceful village, the sun is shining and the flowers are blooming. You and your brother Kai take your time seeing the village and talking to people, enjoying your day off and relaxing, unaware of the change in the air ready to turn the status quo on its head.

You see a vision in the night, an apparition warning you of things to come... A storm has frozen over your village and your brother vanished without a trace. Explore the village and outreaching routes to track down your brother, meet wacky characters, and save the village - but be wary of your actions as you go, for you never know if you'll even recognize yourself when you're through.
